channel.title: code completion on Haobo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in code completion on Haobo's Blog

item.title: Language Server Protocol
item.description: Language Server Protocol(LSP) defines how the development tools and language servers communicate

item.title: Pythia: AI Assisted Code Completion System
item.description: As a part of Intellicode extension in Visual Studio Code, Pythia exploits large scale deep learning methods trained on extracted code context sequences from ASTs and achieves SOTA performance on Python code completion task
